mapper.select: select c.id,c.content,c.sign,c.publish_date,u.id as uid,u.username,v.id as vid,v.name from (select * from comment limit #{start},#{rows}) c left join user u on c.user_id=u.id left join view v on c.view_id=v.id order by c.publish_date desc
